p. facing t.p. verso (Florence Architecture Workshop) p. 176 (urban design projects produced as part of the Florence Architecture Workshop; the first workshops were held in the Santa Teresa education complex in Florence, Italy from 16-20 Apr. and 30 Apr.-4 May 2007; and the second workshop at Palazzo Cerchi (the Kent State Univ. Florence Program) in Florence from 31 Mar.-5 Apr. 2008)

Florence Program) from 13-18 Sept. 2011)
